name: Cool Swords in Caves - Sworderang Loading Screen
name_original: Cool Swords in Caves - Sworderang Loading Screen
description:
Controls: Press any key to play!

Made a little loading screen game for the game I'm currently working on – "Cool Swords in Caves"! It's a little minigame where you use a sworderang (the safest weapon) to collect some bonus potions for the main game (which... isn't really playable yet...)!
